Title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
Writer: Tom Nursall (screenplay), Harris Goldberg (screenplay), Michael Allin (story)
Actors: Jonathan Taylor Thomas, Jessica Biel, Adam LaVorgna, Gary Cole
Plot: A college student experiences difficulty in getting home for Christmas after being hazed by his friends. While struggling to get home in time for Christmas, he learns quite a bit about himself and the true meaning of the holiday.
